thread.title: Kimberly Kim

author: Kimberly Kim
title: Kimberly Kim
text: The reason why I shop at YesStyle so much is simply because of the affordable variety of products they offer. Though I may not purchase a lot, in the times I do, the shirts and dresses all came in perfect shape; even the shipping boxes too! From weird and cute things like strawberry hair curlers to extravagant/formal wear such as bridal dresses, they cover it all. Though personally, the casual wear is what attracted me to this website.
